text: Ate asim musa nu kitaba diti ate phira ika tom ba'ada ika rasula (sadesa vahaka) bheje. Ate mari'ama de putara isa nu khul'hi'am khul'hi'am nisani'am diti'a ate pavitara atama (ruha-ula-kudasa) nala unham di saha'ita kiti tam jadom vi ko'i rasula (sadesa vahaka) tuhade kola uha ciza lai ke a'i'a jihari tuhade cita nu pasada nahim si, tam tusim hakara kita, phira tusim (paigabaram de? Ika samuha nu jhutha kita ate ika samuha di hati'a kara diti)
